tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE StemCellResearchInstitutions (
  institution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  institution_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  research_focus TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE research_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    lead_researcher VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    institution_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (institution_id) REFERENCES stemcell_research_institutions(institution_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Researchers (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  title VARCHAR(50),
  institution_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (institution_id) REFERENCES Institutions(id)
);

CREATE TABLE ResearchProjects (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(100),
  description TEXT,
  researcher_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researchers(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Researchers (
    researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
    institute_id INT,
    field_of_research VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (institute_id) REFERENCES Institutes(institute_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ResearchProjects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_title VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    researcher_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researchers(researcher_id)
);

CREATE TABLE DataSamples (
    sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_type VARCHAR(255),
    project_id INT,
    researcher_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES ResearchProjects(project_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researchers(researcher_id)
);

CREATE TABLE DataSharing (
    sharing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    sharing_institute_id INT,
    permission_level VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES ResearchProjects(project_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (sharing_institute_id) REFERENCES Institutes(institute_id)
);
